comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: This is probably Samuel Bell Thomas, a New York lawyer who was active in defense of Gov. Sulzer during his impeachment in 1913: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=940DE... He later wrote a book about the affair: www.archive.org/details/bossorgovernortr00thomuoft (PS: The handwriting on the left side of the photo says "Samuel Bell Thomas")

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samuel_Bell_Thomas

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Thanks for pointing out his full name.  We'll update the record.
